entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 a.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 2:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
